meanings.definition: The quality of being small in length or duration.
meanings.sent1: The shortness of the book made it easy to finish in one sitting.
meanings.sent2: I appreciated the shortness of the meeting as it didn't take up too much time.
meanings.sent3: The shortness of the movie left me wanting more.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was like the shortness of a shooting star, brief but memorable.
meanings.sent5: The shortness of the skirt made it inappropriate for the formal event.

meanings.definition: The state of being brief or concise.
meanings.sent1: The shortness of his explanation left me confused.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the shortness of text messages over long emails.
meanings.sent3: The shortness of the joke made it even funnier.
meanings.sent4: The shortness of her response spoke volumes about her feelings.
meanings.sent5: The shortness of the recipe made it easy to follow.
